install.name: Nice Constant Contact Signup
install.author: Michael Babcock
install.description: A Constant Contact newsletter sign-up form. Please enable the module and specify your Constant Contact Account ID for proper usage.

param.name: ccid
param.label: Constant Contact ID
param.description: The account client ID provided by Constant Contact

param.name: mod_desc
param.default: Sign up for our FREE newsletters now!
param.label: Module Description
param.description: This text is display above the newsletter sign up form.

param.name: email_desc
param.label: Email Field Text
param.description: This text displays in the email input text field.

param.name: submit_btn
param.label: Submit Button Text
param.description: This text is the label for the submit button.
